meanings.definition: In a brave and determined manner.
meanings.sent1: She walked pluckily into the dark forest, ready to face any challenge.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter pluckily rushed into the burning building to save the trapped cat.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel pluckily tried to climb the tall tree but kept slipping down.
meanings.sent4: The young knight pluckily faced the dragon, armed only with a wooden sword.
meanings.sent5: Despite the stormy weather, the sailor pluckily steered the ship to safety.

meanings.sent1: The pluckily girl stood up to the bully, refusing to back down.
meanings.sent2: The pluckily team never gave up, even when they were losing the game.
meanings.sent3: The pluckily puppy barked at the big dog, thinking it was the same size.
meanings.sent4: The pluckily flower pushed through the cracks in the pavement, blooming brightly.
meanings.sent5: The pluckily student raised their hand to ask a question, eager to learn more.
